tagfilter.fieldDescription: Leave empty to allow all namespaces.
tagfilter.name: ./taggingFilter
tagfilter.optionsProvider: function() { try { var tags = CQ.Util.eval(CQ.HTTP.get("/content/cq:tags.tags.json?count=false")); var opts = []; for (var name in tags) { var ns = tags[name]; for(var val in ns) { if (ns[val].title) { opts.push({value: ns[val].path, text: ns[val].title}); } } } opts.sort(function (l1, l2) {if (l1.text < l2.text) {return -1;} else if (l1.text == l2.text) {return 0;} else {return 1;}}); opts.push({value: '/content/cq:tags', text: 'Include All Tags'}); return opts; } catch (e) { CQ.Log.error("Loading Tag Namespaces Failed: " + e.message); } return []; }

tagFilterLimit.fieldDescription: Number of suggested tags that should be displayed. Default: -1, no limits.
